Ndamira Catherine Atwikiire (amụrụ n'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1977) bụ onye na-ahụ maka ego na Uganda, onye omeiwu na nwanyị ọchụnta ego

A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'ime ndị omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda dị ka onye nnọchiteanya nwanyị distrikti maka Kabale District nke bụ mpaghara Kigezi n'okpuru otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement (NRM). Ọ bụ onye otu Kọmitii Akụkọ Ọha ma bụrụkwa onye otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka ahụike na 10th parliament nke Uganda. Ọ bụkwa onye otu Uganda Parliamentary Forum na nchefu nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya (UPFSP). E guzobere nzukọ ahụ iji rụọ ọrụ maka nchedo ọha na eze, na-eji nkwado, mmetụta, nlekọta na nlekota, na nnọchiteanya.
Site na afọ 2010 ruo na afọ 2015, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkwa ego maka VIDAS Engineering Services Co
A họpụtara ya dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị distrikti na afọ 2016
Atwikiire bụ onye otu Kọmitii Akụkọ Ọha na Kọmitii Ahụike
A họpụtakwara ya na Kọmitii maka East African Community Affairs.
Nzukọ ndị omeiwu a na-arụ ọrụ iji kwalite iwu na iwu ndị ga-eme ka nchebe ọha na eze nke ndị nọ n'ihe ize ndụ n'ime mba ahụ dịkwuo mma

Iji mezuo ebumnauche a, ndị otu nzukọ ahụ na-etinye aka n'ịkwado iwu na-akwado nchebe ọha na eze; na-akwalite ma na-ahụ maka nlekọta na nlekota nke mmetụta nke iwu gọọmentị na nchịkwa na mmepe ọha na eze na obodo; ma sonye n'ọtụtụ ọrụ na ọfịs ndị omeiwu iji nweta nnọchiteanya gafee mpaghara iwu.

Ndamira Atwakire nyere ụmụ amaala Kabale ezì, agwa, ọka na cabbage, wusie ahịa nke nkata na mat ike, nye ụmụ amaala mmiri pọmpụ, tinye mmemme ndị ntorobịa dị ka SACCOS (Savings and Credit Cooperative Organizations), nye ndị ambulance na Ụlọ Ọrụ Ahụike ma tinye ọkụ nchebe. Ọ kwàdòrò egwuregwu na egwuregwu n'ime Kabale District. Ọ kwalitela ma kwado agụmakwụkwọ n'ime Kabale District ka ọ na-ekere òkè na ọrụ nchịkọta ego nke iwu ụlọ akwụkwọ Kagunga Technical School. Ọ kwadoro ndị ọrụ COVID-19 na mmanụ.
